title: Iubire cu parfum de lavandă
overview: The series brings to the fore an original love story, between two mature people, caught between two completely different worlds, but who have the chance to rebuild their lives, next to each other and find happiness beyond all the hardships they have had and continues to take part. Ştefan (Adi Nartea), a former footballer in a top team from Great Britain, used to the rhythm of the luxurious life in the city, but divorced and the father of a teenage child, arrives in the idyllic village where Anda (Michaela Prosan), a single mother, respected doctor in the community where life has a different rhythm. The two end up experiencing a totally unexpected love. Dark secrets, jealousies, intrigues and lies of all kinds will stand in their way every step of the way until they find their way to each other, in a place where people live and love by different rules.
